# `ceil` Function

`ceil` returns the closest whole number that is greater than or equal to the
given value, which may be a fraction.

## Examples

```
> ceil(5)
5
> ceil(5.1)
6
```

## Related Functions

* [`floor`](/language/functions/floor), which rounds to the nearest whole number _less than_
  or equal.
